name: Human Connection
description:
Portrait made with data dust (crushed CDs, resin and metal parts). The discs were contributed by members of the public, to form a unique amalgamation of historic data.

Hi-res image: 4500 x 3020 pixels

As a social art project, the process is open to everyone. Find out how to recycle and include your obsolete materials in future artworks by getting in touch.

The original painting was created in 2018 and was part of a joint show with Seo Young Deok at Opera Gallery in London.
